text: The 1915 Football Paranaense Championship (in Portuguese: Campeonato Paranaense de Futebol de 1915) was the first championship edition of the Brazilian state of Paraná and southern Brazil.Coritiba e Rio Branco reeditam a primeira partida dos dosi clubes no centenário campeonato paranaense Site Redação em Campo - access in April 17, 2015 Paraná 1915 - Primeiro campeonato estadual do Paraná Site RSSSF Brasil - The Rec.Sport.Soccer Statistics Foundation - access in April 17, 2015 Os campeões Paranaense - Os clubes que levantaram o caneco nas 99 edições anteriores Site newspaper Gazeta do Povo - access in April 17, 2015 Disputado desde 1915, o Campeonato Paranaense é o torneio estadual mais antigo da Região Sul Site ESPN - access in April 17, 2015 The winner this year was the International Football Club. It was a football club of Curitiba, extinct since 1924. ==Games== May 23 - International 2-0 America * May 30 - Coritiba 1-1 Rio Branco * June 6 - Paraná 5-0 Paranaguá * June 13 - America 5-1 Rio Branco * June 20 - Coritiba 1-1 Paraná * June 27 - International 8-1 Paranaguá * July 5th - Coritiba 3-1 America * July 12 - International 2-0 Paraná * July 13 - Internacional 2-0 Coritiba * July 25 - America W-O Paranaguá (Walkover) * July 25 - Paraná 9-0 Rio Branco * August 1 - Rio Branco 3-1 Paranaguá * August 3 - International W-O Rio Branco (Walkover) * August 10 - Paraná 2-0 America * August 17 - Coritiba 2-0 Paranaguá === Return === * August 24 - America 1-0 International * August 31 - Rio Branco 0-3 Coritiba * September 7 - Paranaguá 0-6 Paraná * September 7 - Rio Branco 3-3 America * September 14 - Paraná 1-0 Coritiba * September 21 - Paranaguá 3-7 Internacional * September 28 - America W-O Coritiba ✱ (Walkover) * October 5th - Paraná 1-2 Internacional * October 12 - Paranaguá 3-0 Rio Branco * October 13 - Coritiba 1-3 International * October 19th -Rio Branco O-W Paraná (Walkover) * October 26 - Paranaguá O-W America (Walkover) * November 17th - Rio Branco O-W International (Walkover) * November 2 - America 0-2 Paraná * November 7 - Paranaguá 3-3 Coritiba ==Champion== International Foot-Ball Club == References == ==Other websites== *Federação Paranaense de Futebol 1915 championship Category:1915 in association football Category:Football in Brazil Category:1910s in Brazil
title: 1915 Football Championship Paranaense
